testcase.name: User is able to Login and confirm data is getting transferred from GCS to BigQuery

testcase.failure:
Given Open Datafusion Project to configure pipeline.........................passed When Source is GCS bucket...................................................passed When Target is BigQuery.....................................................passed Then Link Source and Sink to establish connection...........................passed Then Enter the GCS Properties with "@TC-Demo-1_GCS" GCS bucket..............passed Then Close the GCS Properties...............................................passed Then Enter the BigQuery Properties for table "tableDemo"....................passed Then Close the BigQuery Properties..........................................passed Then Save and Deploy Pipeline...............................................passed Then Run the Pipeline in Runtime............................................passed Then Wait till pipeline is in running state.................................passed Then Open Logs..............................................................passed Then Verify the pipeline status is "Succeeded"..............................passed Then validate successMessage is displayed...................................passed Then Get Count of no of records transferred to BigQuery in "tableDemo"......failed Then Delete the table "tableDemo"...........................................skipped
